messages.content: abg-comfyui is an Anime Background Remover node for comfyui, which is based on the Hugging Face space for removing anime backgrounds and works similarly to the ABG extension in automatic1111.

To install abg-comfyui, you need to clone the repository into the custom_nodes directory and install dependencies using pip: `git clone https://github.com/Jcd1230/rembg-comfyui-node.git` and `pip install -r requirements.txt`.
To use abg-comfyui, you must create a 'Remove Image Background (ABG)' node and connect the image to the input. This will remove the image's background.
